description: Cryogonal, known as the Crystal Pokémon, is an Ice-Type Pokémon, based on snow flakes. It resembles a shiny, dark blue snowflake, with eyebrows and light blue, reflective `eyes`. It turns into steam when its body heat rises, before reverting back to ice when its body temperature returns to normal. It is a carnivorous species.
name: Freegeo
